page.title: 02ARMED FORCES,CLUBS,CRAFTS.
page.content:
The army cadets somtimes train in {Delamere Forest,}but as far as we know there are no Military bases in our area.
There are several types of clubs in our area.The{Art and Handicraft clubs involve arts and crafts.There are also clubs for children such as {Cubs,Scouts,Brownies and Guides.}There are also adult groups like the{Round {Table}and{Ladies Circle}and the{W.I. e.t.c.
In our area there is a{Handicraft club which has exhibition shows in{Kingsley {Community Centre.}In their displays they have hand made exhibits.
